1.content:
Okay, here are some choices the start the story.

1. A family experiencing the changes
2. A couple with no kids.
3. A single person
4 and 5 are more choices
1.title: Starting the scenario

13.content: Does this person start as a boy or a girl?
13.title: Single person

131.content: "Damn, working late second shift sucks." Alex thought to himself as he got home at 2:00 am. "Well, at least I get a week off. Time to eat something and go to bed." As he got a frozen pizza out, he saw a bright light shrine through his window. He looked outside, and saw a bright blue ray fly through the night sky. "The hell is that?" he said. Then, the light flew over his house, and he was blinded. After he regained his sight, he noticed things was vastly different from before.
131.title: Boy

1311.content: "Why is everything bigger?" He thought to himself. He then realized his new pants he recently bought had fallen to the ground. He tried to pick them up, but then saw his hair was starting to get in his eyes. However, that raise more concerns, "Why the hell is my hair this long? What the hell is going on!?" He yelled, starting to freak out. He then saw to lumps on his chest, and he then realized what was going on. "I'm a girl! Why the hell am I a girl!?"
1311.title: Scenario 1

14.content: How about a son and mother who live together.
14.title: More choices

info.brief_description: What happens when the entire planet undergoes random changes?
info.description: One morning a bright blue light engulfed the world. It lead to many changes in all of humanity. Adults turned into kids, kids turned into adults, genders change, bodies were swapped, and many other things.
